Dong Biwu (1886-1975), one of the founders of the Chinese communist party
Dong Zhongshu (179-104 BC), philosopher influential in establishing Confucianism as the established system of values of former Han dynasty
forgetting the fate of Ding and Dong (idiom)/unheeding the lessons of the past

sentences.english: Mr Tung disclosed that Mrs Ip had submitted her resignation on June 25.

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiaobao was said to be angered by Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa for underestimating the number of protestors at the July 1 march.

sentences.english: He strongly criticised the democrats for being ambiguous over the anti-Tung issue.
sentences.chinese: 他强烈批评民主党人士倒董立场模糊。

sentences.english: The effect of Yeoh's resignation on the popularity of Tung's cabinet has yet to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 杨永强宣布辞职后对董班子民望的影响，则有待观察。
